string-array.name: place_desc
string-array.item: Senso-ji is the Shrine locates in Asakusa Tokyo
Sultan Ahmed Mosque is mosque locates in Istabul, Turkey
Table Mountain is mountain and park locates in Cape Town, South Africa.

string-array.name: place_details
string-array.item: HP Desktop 1, working well and tested by Alfred Cheok
HP Desktop 2, working well and tested by Alfred Cheok
Super expensive stuff, waiting Teng Jing Yi to buy for me as birthday gift.
